Day in the Life: Graduate Engineering

August 24, 2021

There are hundreds of different blog starters out there. But none felt quite right. So I built my own. Based off the basic Next.js Blog Starter, but now with several handy features like dark mode (using local storage) or Google Analytics. It comes with Storybook too.
